item.title: Read File by N Lines using C programming language
item.description: Read a file by n lines while user pressing y until end of file. /* Author: Ahmedur Rahman Shovon License: "GPL" Date: 2019/09/29 */ #include <stdio.h> /* Function that prints a line from file. Update the printf contents to change format. */ void print_line(int line_number, char line[]) { printf("%s", line); } int main() { char filename[] = "data.txt"; FILE *file = fopen(filename, "r"); int i = 1; // Number of lines per chunk int n = 3; int end = n; char user_choice; if ( file !
